categories: Category:Sith Lords of the One Sith
Category:Unidentified Sith of the One Sith

nodes.text: Darth Nihl's predecessor was a Sith Lord in the One Sith who was Darth Krayt's Hand. After his death at the Massacre at Ossus, he was replaced by Darth Nihl, as Darth Talon was not yet ready to take over.
